entries.welcome_1: I hope you haven't come looking for work because there isn't any.
entries.welcome_4: The Imperials are setting up a camp nearby.  Everyone's moving out of town soon.
entries.welcome_5: Everyone's packing up, getting ready to get out of town.
entries.welcome_6: Well, I guess I'll be on my way.
entries.welcome_7: Don't hang around too long.  Once that basecamp is set up I'm guessing the stormtroopers are going to forcibly remove everyone.
